alert.note: Alert for Eastern Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 09 at 10:03AM EST until February 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected this afternoon for elevations above 2000 feet. Winds will turn west to southwest tonight at similar speeds. * WHERE...In Virginia, Eastern Highland County. In West Virginia, Hampshire and Hardy Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
